author: Clark Breyman

review: I was so excited to finally have a device that supported HBO go.  That's pretty much the only reason I use my Chromecast. I have a smart TV, so most of the supported apps for Chromecast are already available to me, except for the coveted HBO go.  It was easy to set up and connect to the wifi.  I like the slideshow of stock photos that display while it's idle. When I turn on my TV and select Chromecast as the input, it connects and starts quickly.  Picture quality for HBO is great. Life would not be worth living without this little device.
author: Autumn Krepop

review: I love this little gadget.  It's easy to set up using your computer or smart phone and more and more apps/websites are gaining the ability to be "cast" to this device.Pros:Nearly everything. Netflix, Vudu, Youtube, etc. all with your portable devices and computers.Con:you have to use the HDMI extension on TVs that have the HDMI inputs close together.
author: Russell Paddick

review: The Google Chromecast functions absolutely perfectly, outperforming most if not all smart TV's on the market as of its release. A simple design that streams music, movies, and any content you so choose elegantly and efficiently, using any computer, tablet, or phone as a powerful yet simple remote control with virtually no learning curve. It uses HDMI, the most widely used AV cord in the industry as of 2014. And more and more apps and websites are becomming compatable with this device every day. The only downside for this product is that it's so simple to use that it's a shame that it couldn't be easier to set up.If you can't currently stream to your TV, and you want to for cheap. You can do no wrong with Chromecast. In this case, simplicity truly is perfection.
author: Buris

review: This is my 3rd Chromecast device.Easily watch Netflix, Hulu Plus, Youtube etc on any HDMI enabled TV. (must be on same WIFI network)I have 1 in Bedroom, another in Living Room and this 3rd one is going in Kitchen.You can find many Apps that allow you to stream from your mobile phone and tablet to your TV with your Chromecast.Also you can use your Laptop or computer to do the same.I strongly suggest looking for YouTube Videos that describe and review the Chromecast.Can't beat the price and you will wonder why you even need Cable or Satellite TV.Great as a Gift too.
author: S Pettersen

review: This has made watching streaming tv so easy. I have already recommend it to everyone I know. It's easy to install and we haven't had any issues, we've been using it almost daily for over a month now.
